sub_fields.label: Has video
sub_fields.name: has_video
sub_fields.instructions: Does this block have a video background?

sub_fields.label: Video source
sub_fields.name: source
sub_fields.instructions: Vimeo video ID / youtube video ID / inline path+filename

sub_fields.label: Style
sub_fields.name: style
sub_fields.instructions:
black : Black text on light background
white : White text on dark background

sub_fields.label: Column width
sub_fields.name: column_width
sub_fields.instructions: column width in 12ths (bootstrap 12 column grid) 50% = 6 25% = 3 33.3% = 4 etc.

choices.new: Open in new window or tab (link to external site)

sub_fields.label: Module CSS Class
sub_fields.name: module_css_class
sub_fields.instructions: CSS class to apply to this module for more complex styling

sub_fields.label: Full width
sub_fields.name: full_width
sub_fields.instructions: Content spans full width of browser or is limited to centre of page

choices.no: Image display at specified size in middle of column
choices.yes: Image is scaled/cropped to fill entire column

sub_fields.label: Image Size
sub_fields.name: image_size
sub_fields.instructions: Limit the width of the image in the Image Column (value in px or percent)

sub_fields.label: Vector image/animation
sub_fields.name: vector
sub_fields.instructions: Lottie animation

sub_fields.label: Grid Width
sub_fields.name: grid_width
sub_fields.instructions: Number of columns in logo grid

sub_fields.label: Control size by
sub_fields.name: control_size_by
sub_fields.instructions: Set an aspect ratio (height increases with page width) or fixed height of image

choices.natural: Image displayed at natural aspect ratio

sub_fields.label: Aspect ratio
sub_fields.name: aspect_ratio
sub_fields.instructions: ratio of height to width 50% = landscape, 100% = square 150% = portrait

sub_fields.label: Fixed height
sub_fields.name: fixed_height
sub_fields.instructions: height of image in px, percent

sub_fields.label: Number of people per carousel page
sub_fields.name: page_items

choices.self: Opens in same window or tab
choices.blank: Opens in new window or tab

sub_fields.label: Show Filter
sub_fields.name: show_filter
sub_fields.instructions: Show category filter

sub_fields.label: Article count
sub_fields.name: article_initial_count
sub_fields.instructions: Show four articles (home page) or seven articles (news page)

sub_fields.label: How many articles to load
sub_fields.name: article_load_count
sub_fields.instructions: Choose how may articles to load when the 'load more news items' button is triggered

sub_fields.label: Case studies
sub_fields.name: case_studies
sub_fields.instructions: The first N items to be display on page load

sub_fields.label: Show Load More
sub_fields.name: show_load_more
sub_fields.instructions: Show a 'load more' control

sub_fields.label: load count
sub_fields.name: load_count
sub_fields.instructions: How many new items to load for each page

sub_fields.label: preferred order
sub_fields.name: preferred_order
sub_fields.instructions: Set the order for items which appear for 'load more'

sub_fields.label: Graph
sub_fields.name: graph
sub_fields.instructions: Lottie animation file URL

sub_fields.label: Icon
sub_fields.name: icon
sub_fields.instructions: Lottie file URL

sub_fields.label: vector icon
sub_fields.name: vector_icon
sub_fields.instructions: Lottie icon/animation

sub_fields.label: first row layout
sub_fields.name: first_row_layout
sub_fields.instructions: Select first row layout: text then image or image then text. Following rows will alternate text-image, image-text

sub_fields.label: Row Background colour
sub_fields.name: bg2
sub_fields.instructions: leave empty for transparent background

sub_fields.label: Has google map
sub_fields.name: has_google_map
sub_fields.instructions: Show google map widget instead of image (for contact page)

sub_fields.label: Directions
sub_fields.name: directions
sub_fields.instructions: lat/lon, postcode or address for 'Get directions' link

choices.smallfirst: Small image on Left, Large image on right
choices.largefirst: Large image on Left, Small image on right

sub_fields.label: Layout
sub_fields.name: layout
sub_fields.instructions: Ordering of first row, following rows alternate

choices.text-first: Text on left, Image on right
choices.image-first: Image on left, text on right
